text:
He may be small in stature, but this Jedi master, who was rendered in CGI in the Star Wars prequels, wields one heck of a lightsaber.

This is the Star Wars mashup we’re looking for.

In honor of Star Wars: The Last Jedi hitting theaters this week, Jimmy Fallon and the Tonight Show team made a hilarious mashup video of characters from all the movies singing “MMMBop” by Hanson.

Yoda, Darth Vader, C-3PO, and Jabba the Hutt all make appearances in the funny video. Watch it here:

Fallon has chatted with multiple members of the Star Wars cast over past few weeks, including John Boyega, who talked about Prince Harry’s and Prince William’s cameos in the upcoming film:

https://parade.com/625023/lindsaylowe/john-boyega-on-prince-harrys-and-prince-williams-cameos-in-star-wars-the-last-jedi/

Are you seeing Star Wars: The Last Jedi this weekend? Tell us in the comments!

https://parade.com/604099/lindsaylowe/happy-birthday-mark-hamill-9-reminders-that-hes-the-biggest-star-wars-nerd-of-us-all/
